text: Kino Świat ("world cinema") is a Polish independent film distributor and producer. The company was founded in Warsaw in 2001. It was honored by the Polish Film Institute for film distribution in 2011 and 2012. ==References== == External links == Category:2001 establishments in Poland Category:Companies based in Warsaw Category:Film production companies of Poland Category:Film distributors of Poland Category:Video on demand services
title: Kino Świat
